statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_location = 'New York' AND patient_age > 30;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' AND patient_age > 20;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'male' AND age > 30;

DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age >= 60 AND location = 'Hospital A';
